The TV Golden Globes category refers to the annual awards given by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association (HFPA) to recognize excellence in television programming. The awards ceremony, which is considered one of the most prestigious in the industry, honors outstanding performances and productions in various categories such as drama, comedy, and miniseries or motion picture made for television.
